title: Aabharana Kundala: Exquisite Diamond and Gemstone Mango Haaram
materials: Base metal crafted with a fine layer of gold plating
shimmering with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Adorned with vibrant
high-luster ruby and emerald gemstones. Showcases intricate Hyderabadi polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This stunning Haaram features the iconic mango (paisley) design, a timeless symbol of prosperity. Each mango motif is meticulously encrusted with CZ stones, framing vibrant rubies and emeralds in a flower-like setting. The central pendant showcases a grand mango design with elaborate detailing and delicate gemstone drops (gutta pusalu style) for a touch of classic South Indian charm. Delicate floral motifs intertwine to add to the necklace's beauty. This piece also has a modern aesthetic.
colors: Primarily gold with the dazzling sparkle of clear CZ stones. The rich red of the rubies and the lush green of the emeralds create a captivating and auspicious color palette
occasions: and other auspicious occasions like Seemantham or Half-Saree functions. Its timeless elegance also makes it suitable for grand parties and festive celebrations.
description: This Aabharana Kundala Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The intricate CZ detailing and vibrant gemstones create a dazzling effect, while the mango motif symbolizes prosperity and good fortune. With Hyderabadi polish, this piece promises lasting brilliance, making it a cherished heirloom for generations. A perfect blend of traditional aesthetics and modern sensibilities.
